announcements.author: AQUIL the eagle
announcements.title: Welcome to CharCrafter!
announcements.content: We are excited to announce the launch of the official CharCrafter website. Stay tuned for all the game's updates!

announcements.author: AQUIL the eagle
announcements.title: New version of CharCrafter 'Ver1 AlpDev1.1' released!!!
announcements.content: In this new version, time has been added, which passes faster if the player moves.

announcements.author: AQUIL the eagle
announcements.title: New version of CharCrafter 'Ver1 AlpDev1.2' released!!!
announcements.content: In this new version, temperature has been added, which changes according to the season and the tile.

announcements.author: AQUIL the eagle
announcements.title: New version of CharCrafter 'Ver1 AlpDev1.3' released!!!
announcements.content: In this new version, hunger, thirst, and stamina now decrease day by day, move by move. An inventory has also been added, with a starter kit and the option to eat or drink.

announcements.author: AQUIL the eagle
announcements.title: New version of CharCrafter 'Ver1 AlpDev1.4' released!!!
announcements.content: In this new version, each tile now has its own minimap, making the map now 640000 tiles large and making a huge impact on the future of CharCrafter.
